welcome.title: Welcome to Literary Universe
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour of your dashboard to help you get started with your writing journey.

topMenu.title: Main Navigation
topMenu.content: This is your main navigation menu. Let's go through each item.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Your personal homepage with activity updates, and access to your workshop, library, and social features.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.content: Explore stories and universes created by other users. Read behind the scenes and in-depth blog posts from the authors. Find your next favorite read!

social.title: Social
social.content: Shared joy is 10x the joy! Find groups of like minded people, join our Discord and discover who else is on Literary Universe!

scratchpad.title: Scratchpad
scratchpad.content: Scratchpad is your personal notebook that is always available for you to jot down ideas, notes, and thoughts.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: Stay updated with comments, follows, and other community interactions.

messages.title: Messages
messages.content: Communicate with other writers, beta readers, and collaborate on projects.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Manage your personal information, preferences, and account settings.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.content: Your creative space for writing, editing, and managing your stories and universes.

library.title: Your Library
library.content: Access all your saved stories, reading lists, and downloaded content in one place.

leftMenu.title: Quick Access Menu
leftMenu.content: This sidebar provides quick access to important features and tools.

writerEncouragement.title: Ready to Create?
writerEncouragement.content: As a writer, your Workshop is where the magic happens! Start a new story, continue writing an existing one, or build out your universe. Your readers are waiting!

readerEncouragement.title: Ready to Explore?
readerEncouragement.content: As a reader, Discovery is your gateway to amazing stories! Explore new genres, follow your favorite authors, and build your reading lists. Happy reading!

welcome.title: Welcome to Literary Universe Workshop
welcome.content: Your Workshop is the heart of your creative journey on Literary Universe. Here you can create, manage, and collaborate on your stories and universes.

theWay.title: The Way of the Author
theWay.content: Track your progress as a writer with The Way of the Author. This gamified system helps you level up by completing writing milestones and engaging with the community. Click here to learn more about how it works.

ownWork.title: Your Creative Works
ownWork.content: Literary Universe offers multiple ways to express your creativity. You can create standalone stories, build expansive universes with interconnected tales, or write fan fiction inspired by other authors' worlds. Let's explore what you can create.

universe.title: Literary Universes
universe.content: Universes are the foundation of Literary Universe. They act as containers for your serialized stories that take place in the same literary universe. Universes offer powerful features like encyclopedias, blogs, forums, and more. You'll get the most out of Literary Universe by building universes for your interconnected stories.

story.title: Standalone Stories
story.content: These are self-contained stories that don't belong to any universe. Perfect for short stories, novellas, or tales that stand alone. You can also create stories within universes to benefit from being connected to a larger world with shared encyclopedias and community features.

fanfiction.title: Fan Fiction
fanfiction.content: Fan fiction lets you write stories in universes created by other authors. To create fan fiction, you need to add the universe to your library first. You'll have access to the universe's encyclopedia and community features, but you won't have write permissions to the original universe. Fan fiction also has limitations like no monetization.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Works
collaborative.content: This section shows all your collaboration invitations from other authors. You'll also see any works where you've accepted collaboration requests. Collaborate on universes and stories with other writers to build amazing worlds together.

translations.title: Translations
translations.content: Manage translation requests and your translation work here. Just like collaborations, this section shows translation invitations and accepted translation projects. You can also translate your own stories into other languages to reach a global audience.

betaReadings.title: Beta Readings
betaReadings.content: Beta reading gives you early access to stories and provides valuable feedback to authors. This section shows beta reading invitations and projects you're currently beta reading. Help other writers improve their work while getting early access to exciting new stories.

theWayFinish.title: Continue Your Journey
theWayFinish.content: Remember to check back here to see your progress on The Way of the Author. Keep writing, collaborating, and engaging with the community to level up! Now, let's start writing!

continueReading.title: Continue Reading
continueReading.content: Welcome to your personal library! Here you can see the stories and universes you've added to track your reading progress. The Continue Reading section shows your most recently accessed content so you can easily pick up where you left off.

all.title: Your Complete Library
all.content: This section shows all the stories and universes you've added to your library. You can organize your reading by genre, author, or status. Add stories and universes to your library to receive updates and track your reading progress.

stories.title: Your Stories
stories.content: All the stories you've added to your library are organized here. Keep track of your reading progress, get notified about new chapters, and never lose your place in your favorite tales.

universes.title: Your Universes
universes.content: Universes you've added to your library appear here. Stay updated on new stories within these universes, explore their encyclopedias, and engage with the community features.

readingLists.title: Reading Lists
readingLists.content: Create and manage your personal reading lists here. Organize stories by themes, series, or any criteria that makes sense to you. Share your lists with others or keep them private.

personalNotes.title: Personal Notes
personalNotes.content: With a platform subscription, you can add personal notes to any story, universe, or encyclopedia entry. Keep track of your thoughts, theories, and insights as you read and explore Literary Universe.

getStarted.title: Ready to Build Your Universe?
getStarted.content: Start adding stories and universes to your library from Discovery. Track your reading progress, create reading lists, and enhance your experience with personal notes. Your literary journey awaits!

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Universe Workshop!
welcome.content: Congratulations on creating your first universe! This is your command center for building and managing your literary world. Let's explore all the powerful tools available to bring your universe to life.

stories.title: Manage Your Stories
stories.content: This is where you manage all the stories within your universe. Create new stories, edit existing ones, and organize your narrative across multiple interconnected tales. Each story can benefit from the shared universe encyclopedia and community features.

encyclopedia.title: Build Your Encyclopedia
encyclopedia.content: Create and manage your universe's encyclopedia - the knowledge base that brings your world to life. Add characters, locations, lore, and other details that readers can explore. A rich encyclopedia makes your universe more immersive and helps readers understand the context of your stories.

page.title: Your Universe Page
page.content: This is your universe's public page where visitors can learn about your world, read your stories, explore the encyclopedia, and engage with your community. Customize this page to showcase your universe and attract new readers.

translations.title: Manage Translations
translations.content: Coordinate translations of your universe content into other languages. Manage translators, track progress, and ensure your stories reach a global audience. Translations help you connect with readers worldwide.

fanManager.title: Fan Manager
fanManager.content: Manage fan interactions and creations inspired by your universe. Track fan fiction, art, and other community content. Engage with your fans and build a thriving community around your world.

statistics.title: Track Your Success
statistics.content: Monitor your universe's performance with detailed analytics. See reader engagement, popular stories, encyclopedia views, and other metrics that help you understand what resonates with your audience.

forum.title: Internal Planning Forum
forum.content: Your universe's internal forum for planning and coordination with collaborators and translators. Discuss story arcs, world-building details, and coordinate your creative efforts. This private space helps your team work together effectively.

collaborators.title: Manage Collaborators
collaborators.content: Invite writers, artists, and other creators to collaborate on your universe. Assign roles and permissions, manage access levels, and build a team to help develop your world together.

monetization.title: Revenue Settings
monetization.content: Configure how you monetize your universe and its content. Set up premium access, manage subscriptions, and establish revenue sharing with collaborators. Turn your creative work into a sustainable income stream.

resolutionCenter.title: Resolution Center
resolutionCenter.content: Handle disputes, content violations, and other issues that may arise in your universe. This centralized system helps maintain a positive community and resolve conflicts efficiently.

settings.title: Universe Settings
settings.content: Configure your universe's core settings including privacy, access controls, categories, and other fundamental options. These settings determine how your universe operates and who can interact with it.

forumSettings.title: Forum Configuration
forumSettings.content: Fine-tune your universe forum settings. Create categories, set moderation rules, configure permissions, and customize the discussion spaces to best serve your community needs.

getStarted.title: Ready to Build Your Universe?
getStarted.content: You now have all the tools you need to create a rich, engaging universe. Start by adding some stories, building out your encyclopedia, and inviting collaborators. Your literary world awaits creation!
